alert.note: Alert for Los Banos - Dos Palos; Merced - Madera - Mendota (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 22 at 4:33AM PST until January 24 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST TUESDAY... ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30. For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog, as low as 200 feet. For the Wind Advisory, northwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Los Banos -Dos Palos and Merced -Madera -Mendota. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, until 9 AM PST Tuesday. For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 11 AM PST this morning. For the Wind Advisory, from 1 PM this afternoon to 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Frost and freeze conditions can kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility in fog.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing. If driving, slow down, use your low beam headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Los Banos - Dos Palos; Merced - Madera - Mendota
